response: You can contact us through our Help Center or email support@shophelp.com.

query: What are your customer service hours?
response: Our customer service team is available 24/7 to assist you.

query: Do you have a physical store?
response: Yes, we have physical stores in major cities. You can check our Store Locator page for more details.

query: Can I get help with my order?
response: Sure! Please provide your order ID so we can check the details for you.

query: How long will it take to receive a response?
response: We usually respond within 1 to 2 business days.
You can leave feedback on your order page or email us directly.

query: Do you have a live chat?
response: Yes, we have a live chat option available on our homepage during business hours.

query: Can I talk to a real agent?
response: Yes, if your concern needs human assistance, we can connect you to a live agent.

query: How do I track my issue status?
response: You can track your issue under 'My Support Tickets' in your account settings.
